scripts.codegen: graph-compiler --config configs/veAssets-mainnet.json --include src/datasources/ --include src/templates/ --export-subgraph && cp src/schema.graphql generated/veAssets.schema.graphql && graph codegen generated/veAssets.subgraph.yaml
scripts.codegen-fantom: graph-compiler --config configs/veAssets-fantom.json --include src/datasources/ --include src/templates/ --export-subgraph && cp src/schema.graphql generated/veAssets.schema.graphql && graph codegen generated/veAssets.subgraph.yaml
scripts.codegen-avalanche: graph-compiler --config configs/veAssets-avalanche.json --include src/datasources/ --include src/templates/ --export-subgraph && cp src/schema.graphql generated/veAssets.schema.graphql && graph codegen generated/veAssets.subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy-local: graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 vemarketcap/veMarketCap generated/veAssets.subgraph.yaml
